questions.question: What is the predominant color scheme of the packaging, as visibly depicted?

Based on the image, what appears to be the primary material of the product's packaging?
What is the apparent texture of the packaging's surface, as visually suggested?
Discerning from the visual, what is the apparent finish of the packaging's surface?
Examining the design, what graphic patterns are present on the packaging's visible surfaces?
What word, prominently displayed on the packaging, identifies the product type?
In the visible branding, what word seems to represent the product manufacturer or brand?
What color is the secondary hue visibly present in the packaging's design?

What is the implied method of dispensing tissues based on the packaging design?
What text indicates the count of items (e.g., tissues) inside the packaging?
Judging from its form, what is the general function of the item displayed?
Does the packaging show any visible perforations or tear lines?
Considering the overall design, is the style of the packaging modern or traditional?
